name: Albedo
desc: A genius known as the Kreideprinz, he is the Chief Alchemist and Captain of the Investigation Team of the Knights of Favonius.

imgDesc.text:
Original Outfit - Newmoon Starlight
Albedo's outfit. The Knights of Favonius alchemist's uniform that Albedo often wears when conducting his experiments.

desc.text: Transient Blossoms generated by Albedo's <color=#ffd780>Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma</color> regenerate 1.2 Energy for Albedo.

Transient Blossoms generated by <color=#ffd780>Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma</color> grant Albedo Fatal Reckoning for 30s:
·Unleashing <color=#ffd780>Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide</color> consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning. Each stack of Fatal Reckoning consumed increases the DMG dealt by Fatal Blossoms and Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide's burst DMG by 30% of Albedo's DEF.
·This effect stacks up to 4 times.

Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field have their Plunging Attack DMG increased by 30%.

Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field who are protected by a shield created by Crystallize have their DMG increased by 17%.

Alchemy is an ancient art, and many of its secrets have been lost to history. The few commonly known alchemy techniques of today are but enough to put some broken odds and ends together, saving you the money you would have otherwise spent on glue.
"Nay, alchemy is not so ignoble an art!" Or so most alchemists would protest.
But as far as the average citizen of Mondstadt was concerned, that was alchemy.
At least until the day Albedo suddenly appeared and decided to stay in Mondstadt.
This young man displayed the true prowess of alchemy to all, bringing with him a massive corpus of wisdom that even the Sumeru Akademiya did not possess.
"The universe is heaven reversed, and the earth is a dream lost to time. This is dust, the most basic form of complex life."
As if to provide evidence for this claim, Albedo lifted the burnt ash of the flower that once grew atop a Dendro Slime's head.
Seconds later, a Cecilia sprouted forth from the ash in his hand.
"And this... is new life."

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 2</color>
Albedo has a very important job within the Knights of Favonius but does not often appear in public.
Still, he does not have the strange and eccentric temper that people tend to assume of academics. In fact, he is earnest in all his dealings.
He is, however, of the persuasion that it requires more energy to maintain relationships established on excessive enthusiasm.
As a result, Albedo's equivalent of friendship involves maintaining an appropriate degree of distance.
On days when he shuts himself away in his laboratory to focus on his work, or heads out into the wild to gather materials, no one in Mondstadt will be able to find him.
Yet Albedo's tendency to avoid social interactions does not make him a cold-hearted person.
He delights in giving guidance to his assistants, Timaeus and Sucrose.
He finds pleasure in giving his sketches to the citizens of Mondstadt.
Yet he cannot help but feel sincere disappointment that Lisa, for all her great talents, has chosen to remain a mere Librarian.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 3</color>
"Albedo got into Mondstadt because of his master's recommendation letter."
This statement is technically true. But Monstadt's gates are open to everyone, and he would have been quite welcome even without the recommendation letter.
In fact, Albedo's life in Mondstadt may even have been more comfortable without it.
This is because the recipient of the letter was the famed travel writer, Alice, an old friend of Albedo's master, Rhinedottir.
After receiving the letter, Alice considered its requests.
"So, Rhine said that you'll need a laboratory... And not one of a size that a civilian could build, either. Hmm... I know!"
And just like that, she threw him into the Knights of Favonius.
The work of the Knights was actually quite easy for Albedo, requiring only five percent of his energy.
The rest of his energy could be spent on experiments, with the Knights' full range of apparatus at his disposal, he thought.
And yet...
Alice has a daughter, named Klee.
Yes, "that" Klee.
"We'll be a family from now on, treat her like a real younger sister!"
From that day forth, cleaning up after Klee would come to take up most of Albedo's remaining energy...

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4</color>
Albedo has no memory of any blood relations. From as far back as he can remember, he was already adventuring deep within domains with his master.
Of course, Miss Alice, the Knights of Favonius, and that traveler who had a sense of the stellar depths about them... They are all important people. And yet his master is unquestionably the most special to him.
For Albedo, she is his only kin.
She was a cold and strict woman who raised him and taught him the secrets of alchemy.
"The universe is the sable essence of the true starry sky... Earth is the accumulated memory of time and being...
Chalk: that is you. Soil is where alchemy derives its name, and is the basis of all life. And this..."
She demonstrated her technique before him as a huge life form burst from its culture tank in a shower of shattered fragments.
"...This is new birth."

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5</color>
Albedo once led a simple and content existence.
There was no need for him to contemplate anything. Life was uneventful, its meaning consisted of nothing more than accompanying his teacher, doing what she asked of him, and meeting her expectations.
But one day, deep in the heart of a dungeon, master and apprentice discovered an artifact known as The Heart of Naberius.
And with that, his master disappeared, leaving naught but a note, a recommendation letter, and a classical text behind.
Upon the note was written: "Albedo, go to Mondstadt. Find my old friend, Alice, and give her the recommendation letter. Then, complete your final assignment."
The classical text was one of the last extant manuscripts of the Opus Magnum from his master's collection.
If one were to push the definition a little, she had left him another gift — the title of Kreideprinz, and with it, a written acknowledgment that she had nothing further to teach him.
In the past, Albedo's assignments had always been very difficult.
He had always believed wholeheartedly that his master would make good on her threat to leave him, should he fail.
But this assignment she had left to him was far too hard, far beyond the limit of his abilities.
Did this mean, then, that he was fated to never complete it, and thus never see his master again?
"Your final assignment: show me the truth and the meaning of this world."

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6</color>
The alchemy that Albedo commands is wholly different from any of the arts practiced in the Seven Nations of Teyvat.
Its lineage can be traced back to the nation of Khaenri'ah.
Khaenri'ah was an underground realm, with precious few natural fauna. As such, its alchemy focused more heavily on the creation of life.
This art of creation was known as "The Art of Khemia."
Albedo had learned of this in his youth from reading his master's notes.
The next stage after "soil" is "chalk," which was also something his master had mentioned.
"Chalk is the spotless soil, and was used to make primordial man."
Now, Albedo understands alchemy in far greater depth than he did in the beginning, and his knowledge on the subject is far more comprehensive.
"From soil was birthed chalk."
The profundity of this statement is well understood by Albedo now.
Such ineffable secrets are bound up with his fond memories of his master.
She was not his birth mother, but there is no doubt that his life stems from her.
"I hope this isn't just wishful thinking, but... when parents speak to their children about 'the meaning of this world'... surely they just mean the pursuit of a happy life?"
From time to time, Albedo finds himself musing on this sentiment.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4</color>
Albedo's interest in drawing and painting began back in the days of traveling with his master.
At first, he would simply illustrate his notes with basic sketches. But he soon noticed that the process of rendering things in great detail helped him to intimately understand their physical makeup, which was of great utility to his alchemical studies.
Additionally, it also allowed him to enter into a pleasant state of clarity, in which he needed only to focus on observation and creating his artwork, and nothing else.
Eventually, Albedo became a master artist without ever having received formal tuition.
When strolling through Mondstadt, he enjoys sketching and painting all manner of living things, but particularly people in moments of joy.
Sometimes, he even gifts his artwork to his unsuspecting models, believing that when a work of art captures a transient moment of enjoyment, it is something worth treasuring.
Albedo continued to refine his skills in this manner, going from strength to strength — until one day, when he was taken aback by illustrations from Inazuma.
How was it that drawings of such generality could possess such narrative power?
Amazed, he decided to give it a go himself.
...Eventually, after collaborating with a certain novelist by the name of Xingqiu, "A Legend of Sword" was printed and published.
Unfortunately, it received lukewarm reviews, being lambasted as "a dictionary with divine illustrations."

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6</color>
Gaining a Vision came as no great surprise to Albedo.
When he received it, he gave it a single glance before continuing to engross himself in his work.
He barely felt any wave of emotion at all, as if this was something to be taken for granted.
As far as he is concerned, his Vision is merely a tool with which he can more conveniently conduct his research.
What truly sparks joy within him is turning the unknown into the known.
One day, he will understand all there is to know about this world — and Visions are no exception.

value.name: Woodland Dream
value.desc: Albedo's specialty. The fruits and vegetables are laid out like grass, and they stand tall like trees. In this miniature world-in-a-plate, you circle the mottled city wall, follow brown alleys, and enter the light orange castle. A sweet, tender taste then bursts forth like a blooming flower. You open your eyes. There is a smile in the white-haired prince's eyes.

value.name: Albedo
value.desc:
"Kreideprinz" Albedo

Nigredo and calx, rubedo and citrinitas.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Prithiva Topaz Sliver
materials.desc: Character Ascension Material.

materials.name: Cecilia
materials.desc: A beautiful flower with a name that suits its appearance. It only grows where harsh winds blow, and is just as intangible as the true heart of an unbound soul.

materials.name: Divining Scroll
materials.desc: A scroll that likely relates to some kind of magic. Exudes an inexplicable but ominous warmth.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Prithiva Topaz Fragment
materials.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood."

materials.name: Basalt Pillar
materials.desc:
A pillar formed by the shell of a Geo Hypostasis, composed of high-density Geo energy.
It is a testament to Geo's status as the heaviest of the elements. Maybe the reason a Geo Hypostasis creates this pillar out of its shell and raises itself is just to get closer to the sky, not to combat enemies.

materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Prithiva Topaz Gemstone
materials.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future.
This is the trust I have placed in them. Betray it, and you taint my blood."

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.
<color=#ffd780>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
<color=#ffd780>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Teachings of Ballad
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of beautiful feelings. On a beautiful day, the breezes carry with them poetry that touches the heart of people like the wind caressing the leaves.

materials.name: Divining Scroll
materials.desc: A scroll that likely relates to some kind of magic. Exudes an inexplicable but ominous warmth.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Guide to Ballad
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of the will to encourage. In the dark days, the gales in the streets and alleyways whisper words of fury, like the battle drums, like the low rumbling before the storm.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Philosophies of Ballad
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of the desire to spread the word. Though nothing is eternal, though nothing will be the same, the wind's poetry will still spread beyond the skies, the land, the seas to every corner of the world.

materials.name: Forbidden Curse Scroll
materials.desc: A scroll inscribed with ancient images. It is said that few can decipher its meaning, and the few scholars that have all went mad.

materials.name: Tusk of Monoceros Caeli
materials.desc:
The horn of a whale that you obtained from defeating Childe, who had unleashed the might of his Delusion.
It is said that the shape of one's constellation determines one's character. The image of a whale cruising across the celestial heights represents a solipsism that seeks to crush and devour all in its path.
Embracing this aspect of himself, Childe gleefully summoned one such beast before throwing himself into battle against you.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Crown of Insight
materials.desc:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

desc.text:
Albedo creates a Solar Isotoma using alchemy, which deals <color=#ffe699>AoE Geo DMG</color> on appearance.
<color=#ffd780>Solar Isotoma</color>
has the following properties:
· When opponents within the Solar Isotoma field take DMG, the Solar Isotoma will generate Transient Blossoms which deal <color=#ffe699>AoE Geo DMG</color> . DMG dealt scales off Albedo's DEF.
· Transient Blossoms can only be generated once every 2s.
· When a character is located at the locus of the Solar Isotoma, the Solar Isotoma will accumulate Geo power to form a crystallized platform that lifts the character up to a certain height. Only one crystallized platform can exist at a time.
· Solar Isotoma is considered a <color=#ffe699>Geo construct</color> . Only one Solar Isotoma created by Albedo himself can exist at a time.
<color=#ffd780>Hold</color> to designate the location of the skill.
This Geo bloom has an unusual property mirrored in the aim of alchemy. To rise from the earth, soar into the sky, and become the sun.

Under Albedo's command, Geo crystals surge and burst forth, dealing <color=#ffe699>AoE Geo DMG</color> in front of him.
If a Solar Isotoma created by Albedo himself is on the field, 7 Fatal Blossoms will be generated in the Solar Isotoma field, bursting violently into bloom and dealing <color=#ffe699>AoE Geo DMG</color> .
Tectonic Tide DMG and Fatal Blossom DMG will not generate Transient Blossoms.
Under the Kreideprinz's command, the tectonic tide of creation seethes into life.
Transient Blossoms generated by <color=#ffd780>Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma</color> deal 25% more DMG to opponents whose HP is below 50%.
Using <color=#ffd780>Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide</color> increases the Elemental Mastery of nearby party members by 125 for 10s.
When Albedo crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, he has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

videoCollection.title: Character Demo - "Albedo: Contemplation in Chalk" | Genshin Impact
Character Teaser - "Albedo: Still Life and Creation" | Genshin Impact
Genshin Impact EP - A Canvas of Soft Snow on Icy Peaks
Story Teaser: The Mages' Tea Party | Genshin Impact
Version 1.2 "The Chalk Prince and the Dragon" Trailer | Genshin Impact
Version 2.3 "Shadows Amidst Snowstorms" Trailer | Genshin Impact
Version 2.6 "Zephyr of the Violet Garden" Trailer | Genshin Impact

voice.title: Hello
voice.desc: I am Albedo, Chief Alchemist of the Knights of Favonius. You carry the aura of the stars, interesting... I would like to study you, if you do not mind. I'm certain we will have many opportunities to be alone in the future.

voice.title: Chat: Still Life
voice.desc: What a view... How about a quick break so I can sketch this beautiful scenery?

voice.title: Chat: Investigation
voice.desc: "The truth of this world"... *sigh* What could it be?

voice.title: Chat: Reminiscing
voice.desc: Going out into the world and investigating, turning the "unknown" into the "known." ...Ahhh, I missed this feeling.

voice.title: When It Rains
voice.desc: The soil is moist, ideal for collecting the roots of Boom Blossoms. No please, allow me to handle this.

voice.title: When It Snows
voice.desc: Master...

voice.title: When the Sun Is Out
voice.desc: Ample light... active biological organisms... Yes, this is a good place to sketch.

voice.title: Good Morning
voice.desc: Good morning. Are we going to search for ancient relics today?

voice.title: Good Afternoon
voice.desc: Good afternoon. I heard your footsteps. My, it certainly is lively outside of the workshop.

voice.title: Good Evening
voice.desc: *sigh* It's gotten quiet outside...

voice.title: Good Night
voice.desc: Good night, you go ahead and rest. I will just finish one last experiment before bed... If you are interested in the results, I can discuss them with you tomorrow.

voice.title: About Albedo: Genius
voice.desc: Genius? ...A number of people call me that. But I don't think I'm any "genius."

voice.title: About Albedo: Socializing
voice.desc: Relationships are... *sigh* quite troublesome. Once you establish a relation with someone, you must continue to maintain it; if you lose contact, you must reestablish the relation. This taxing cycle requires...a lot of time.

voice.title: About Us: Experiments
voice.desc:
You... want to accompany me while I experiment? I'm honored.
Oh, don't be nervous. My experiments may be dangerous, but no one gets hurt... most of the time.

voice.title: About Us: Assistant
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

Would you oblige me by serving as my assistant? After observing so many experiments, you surely know a good deal about alchemy by now. Relax, we will work together. I don't think you will have any problems. I have faith in my ability to instruct you, and even more faith in your exceptional talents.

voice.title: About the Vision
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

My Vision? Ah, that's nothing more than a tool to aid in my experiments, no different from a beaker or crucible. The one thing about it that really intrigues me is the principle behind how it works... One day, I will uncover its secrets. It's only a matter of time.

voice.title: Something to Share
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

There's something I've always wanted to ask you, but feared rejection and disappointment...
Ahem... I am very interested in your... little floating companion. May I borrow her to investigate for a short while?

voice.title: Interesting Things
voice.desc: You would like to know more about petrified trees? Um... ahem. Actually, the petrified trees you have come across in domains aren't that ancient. Truly ancient trees usually grow to around one or two miles in height? Oh, and there's a kind of large spider that lives around their roots — if you tie one up in cape jasmine and lemongrass and sprinkle on some cardamom, smoke it for a few hours — you get a fragrant taste that's simply... unforgettable.

voice.title: About Family
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

Family? Although Alice has always asked me to call her "Mother," when I think of the idea of "family," my master comes to mind first. My earliest memories in life are of going on adventures with her. She taught me the art of alchemy and much knowledge about the world. Perhaps... even the words "family" and "master" are incapable of fully expressing her meaning to me.

voice.title: About Sucrose: Direction
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Sucrose? I think I more or less understand why she is so dedicated to her research in bio-alchemy... Either way, I'm happy to see her succeed more and more in her endeavors.

voice.title: About Sucrose: Habits
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5

Working with Sucrose on alchemy research is quite pleasant, but she has some... stubborn qualities in regards to certain aspects unrelated to research. For example, I have told her numerous times to just call me "Albedo" since we are about the same age, but she insists on addressing me in an excessively formal manner. *sigh* ...Whatever she prefers, I guess.

voice.title: About Lisa
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Lisa? I always am impressed by the valuable perspectives she brings to discussions. But is a person with her talents satisfied with such a basic occupation as librarian? There must be some hidden reason for this.

voice.title: About Klee
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Indeed, I view Klee as my younger sister. Whenever she gets herself into some explosive sort of trouble, I can only console myself with the fact that her current destructiveness is nothing compared to that of Miss Alice.

voice.title: About Jean
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Jean? She has served exceptionally well as Acting Grand Master. One can even say she is more reliable than Grand Master Varka. Perhaps in our hearts, we all eagerly await the day she can become the official Grand Master herself.

voice.title: About Xingqiu
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Oh, Xingqiu? I find his written works quite interesting. The Yae Publishing House in Inazuma has been asking that I cooperate with a different author for greater royalties. Hmph, do I seem the type to be swayed by a few extra Mora?

voice.title: About Barbara
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Barbara? She's a very earnest Deaconess. I once had the opportunity to sketch her a simple portrait... What happened to the sketch? Ah yes... Albert offered to purchase it, but I rejected his bid and gave it to the Acting Grand Master. Social relations... really require a lot of effort.

voice.title: More About Albedo: I
voice.desc: Have a question for me? Go ahead, ask. It doesn't take too long to ask a single question, does it? I'm about to begin the final stage of an experiment...

voice.title: More About Albedo: II
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 3

Oh, by the way. Did you know that without human manipulation, you would need to harness the power of a sun eight times the size of our own in order to naturally create gold?

voice.title: More About Albedo: III
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

The time required to sketch portraits closely correlates with one's mood. I could spend half a day sketching Huffman, while I might only need three strokes of the pencil to sketch Kaeya — one for the face, one for the eyepatch string... and one for the eyepatch.

voice.title: More About Albedo: IV
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5

What do I do besides sketching and research...? I will occasionally read novels from Inazuma and Liyue. They contain many fascinating ideas which can sometimes provide me with unexpected inspirations for my own creations.

voice.title: More About Albedo: V
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

Even now, I find the nigredo processing stage of alchemy passed down by my master to be full of mystery. What did my master want to create using this technique...? My research is far from over. I will require your help to investigate further.

voice.title: Albedo's Hobbies
voice.desc: Hmm... Besides research, the activity I spend most of my time on is probably sketching. At first I saw it simply as a way to better study the structure of living things and materials so as to aid me in my experiments, but it eventually became a hobby of mine. Indeed, it is a very good way to relax.

voice.title: Albedo's Troubles
voice.desc: There's just never enough time, is there? Even when I remove the most troublesome matters from my schedule, I still can't find enough time for everything.

voice.title: Favorite Food
voice.desc: I really do enjoy having dessert. How can I put it...? When both physical and mental capacity are spent, high-energy materials further provide a kind of primordial, highly-effective boost.

voice.title: Least Favorite Food
voice.desc: What food do I dislike? ...Large portions of meat at restaurants. I have a rather small appetite, so a meal like that only ends up in tragedy — either I overeat and the joy of the taste is lost, or I don't finish it and the food is wasted. I decided to simply not go to restaurants, although that has also meant I must spend more time preparing my own food...

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: I
voice.desc: If flavors were colors... this one would be gold.

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: II
voice.desc: You're willing to spend so much time on improving your cooking, and that's precisely how you're able to make it taste so good.

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: III
voice.desc: This is more than I can manage... maybe we could split it between us?

voice.title: Birthday
voice.desc: Happy birthday. You look especially happy, would you mind if I sketched you? The capacity of our brains is limited, so we are bound to forget things. But when an image is transferred onto paper or canvas, the sketch becomes an extension of our memory. We can remember that past feeling when we later look at the sketch.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Intro
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 1

Nigredo is the first step in alchemy, drawing from primordial forms. As beings who live in this world, we must find our own meaning.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 2

Albedo is the step in which change begins. Clearing away the excess so we can take on all the knowledge that is available. Would you like to investigate this world with me?

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Climax
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 4

Rubedo in alchemy refers to the refining of feeling. I feel the refining of my own emotions is also thanks to you.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 6

Citrinitas is the final stage of the alchemical transmutation process. The meaning of the object being transmuted has finally been brought to light, becoming gold and revealing its true value... I too have found my own meaning.

voice.title: Elemental Skill: I
voice.desc: Burst forth.

voice.title: Elemental Skill: II
voice.desc: Come into being!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: III
voice.desc: Live.

voice.title: Elemental Burst: I
voice.desc: Moment of birth.

voice.title: Elemental Burst: II
voice.desc: Feel this ancient power.

voice.title: Elemental Burst: III
voice.desc: Witness my great undertaking.

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: I
voice.desc: This world holds many a rare treasure.

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: II
voice.desc: If this treasure could talk...

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: III
voice.desc: Although it's not gold, it certainly glitters.

voice.title: Low HP: I
voice.desc: My calculations were off...

voice.title: Low HP: II
voice.desc: Time to reassess...

voice.title: Low HP: III
voice.desc: A new strategy's required.

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: I
voice.desc: I'll take over from here.

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: II
voice.desc: This is too dangerous for you.

voice.title: Fallen: I
voice.desc: Ashes to ashes, dust to dust...

voice.title: Fallen: II
voice.desc: My... experiment... failed...

voice.title: Fallen: III
voice.desc: Seems my research... is over...

voice.title: Light Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: Still within my threshold.

voice.title: Heavy Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: A miscalculation...

voice.title: Joining Party: I
voice.desc: Understood.

voice.title: Joining Party: II
voice.desc: Some in-the-field research?

voice.title: Joining Party: III
voice.desc: Let's investigate this further.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>December 17, 2020</color>
Travelers \ (^ o ^) / ~
The star of the show today is Mondstadt's genius alchemist — Albedo. He is pushing the true limits of alchemy on behalf of the people of the world... He doesn't consider himself to be a genius, however...
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/107046</color>

<color=#ffd780>December 17, 2020</color>
"Albedo is so smart and gentle. He's super nice to me too! He always plays with the weirdest things, so I love following him around~!" —Klee
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/107049</color>

<color=#ffd780>December 17, 2020</color>
"Do you seek to investigate the origin of the world? We tread the same path then."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/107088</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 13, 2021</color>
"According to the Traveler, the last research ingredient to be added… should be hilichurl's hair? Hmm, what a bold idea."
"No, Paimon thinks it should be Slime Condensate!"
"Paimon's idea is interesting too. Then, let's give it a try."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/892586</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 13, 2021</color>
Thank you for the cake, I'm honored.
Oh? You are asking if I draw the cake, will there be more desserts?
Well... if that's your wish, then I'll try.
If you can't finish eating it, take it and share it with everyone.
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1437294974647869440</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 13, 2022</color>
"Albedo! It's your birthday today, so Klee made this upgraded version of Jumpy Dumpty as a present for you!"
"Thank you, Klee. I like it very much."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/8843585</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 13, 2022</color>
I haven't had a gathering with this many people in a long time. This is a novel experience for me, thank you for your invitation.
But judging by your expression, it looks like you have something to tell me?
Why don't we go outside quietly and get some fresh air for a while? We'll come back quickly.
Everyone seems to be having a good time, so I don't think they'll mind.
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/8843586</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 13, 2023</color>
I haven't had a gathering with this many people in a long time. This is a novel experience for me, thank you for your invitation.
But judging by your expression, it looks like you have something to tell me?
Why don't we go outside quietly and get some fresh air for a while? We'll come back quickly.
Everyone seems to be having a good time, so I don't think they'll mind.
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/21593262</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 9, 2023</color>
Ah, you're here. As it just so happens, the tools for the experiment are ready.
The Padisarah you sent me is of excellent quality. It'll no doubt produce spices of the highest quality.
By the way, perhaps you'd like to try mixing a flavor yourself?
Fret not, there are detailed formulas in the alchemy notes. If there's anything you don't understand, I'll walk you through it.
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/21593274</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 9, 2024</color>
"Captain Albedo, please take a look! This is my latest sketch from practice! ...What do you think?"
"...Well, if you consider it a form of relaxation, it's not bad."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/33212153</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 9, 2024</color>
Dragonspine is one of my favorite places to visit and collect inspiration during my leisure time.
Just like now, the skies have cleared after the snowfall and birds are chirping lively. Setting up an easel here is bound to capture a remarkable scene.
However, the snowy landscape can be too serene, and painting just the scenery might leave the composition feeling somewhat sparse. If only I could add a figure to it... Hmm, you'd be willing to model for me?
Alright, then come over here. Fret not, just stay in your most comfortable, natural state.
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/33212154</color>
Version 1.2 - The Chalk Prince and the Dragon

<color=#ffd780>February 15, 2021</color>
Klee, you can light those fireworks you love so much now — just watch the fuse.
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/188377</color>

<color=#ffd780>November 23, 2021</color>
"Albedo! Are you working on some new research? It looks interesting!"
"Yes, this experiment is about... K—KLEE?! Please stop throwing bombs around!"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/1439836</color>

<color=#ffd780>December 2, 2021</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Japanese]</color>
"What a nice view. I'll draw this view during my break."
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/Genshin_7/status/1466346404750655494</color>
Version 2.6 - Zephyr of the Violet Garden

<color=#ffd780>April 28, 2022</color>
Click image to view full wallpaper
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/4450907</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 12, 2023</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Portuguese]</color>
"This is a memorable moment."
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/BRGenshinImpact/status/1668241813340037121</color>

<color=#ffd780>October 14, 2022</color>
"Albedo, look! A big Crystalfly!"
"Slow down, Klee. Be careful, don't fall now."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/12355272</color>

<color=#ffd780>December 25, 2022</color>
"Good job Klee, I'm sure everyone will like it."
Thanks to Cocoon for the fantastic artwork!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/14548853</color>

<color=#ffd780>October 9, 2023</color>
"Next... Next... How many more are there!? You never know how hard something is until you've tried it yourself, huh... That's it, I can't sign any more, Mr. Calx..."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/22206206</color>

<color=#ffd780>April 6, 2022</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Chinese]</color>
Hello fellow travelers, the number of fans on the official Weibo of "Genshin Impact" has now exceeded 4 million.
<color=#ffacff>Weibo:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/m.weibo.cn/status/4755225636507890</color>

<color=#ffd780>May 8, 2022</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Japanese]</color>
Thanks to Tabibito (Travelers), the number of official Twitter followers has exceeded 2.1 million!
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/Genshin_7/status/1523150704596197376</color>

<color=#ffd780>August 14, 2022</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Chinese]</color>
Hello travelers, the number of fans at the official Bilibili of Genshin Impact has exceeded 13 million.
<color=#ffacff>Bilibili:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/t.bilibili.com/694118946137178152</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 20, 2022</color>
Hello, dear Travelers from all over the world, registration for the Genshin Impact X HoYoQuiz Quiz Show opens today! If you are confident in your knowledge of Genshin Impact, sign up for the contest now and get a chance to win great Primogem rewards! Wait no more, come join us!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/9001449</color>
Alipay x M&G Stationery x Genshin Impact

<color=#ffd780>June 23, 2023</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Chinese]</color>
Dear Travelers, Genshin Impact, Alipay, and M&G Stationery's joint charity event "Forest Journey, Building the Dream Forest" will be launched soon!
<color=#ffacff>Miyoushe:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.miyoushe.com/ys/article/40925198</color>

<color=#ffd780>August 13, 2023</color>
Neither dwell on your regrets, nor fret over what the future holds.
This melody has witnessed all seasons and climes, settling at last like morning dew in a dream.
Melodies of an Endless Journey will soon resound anew...
<color=#ff9999>YouTube:</color>

<color=#ffd780>March 11, 2024</color>
Travelers, the "Genshin Impact X Discovery" Nature Benefit Collaboration's spokespersons have been revealed!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/25833118</color>

Albedo — an alchemist based in Mondstadt, in the service of the Knights of Favonius.
"Genius," "Kreideprinz," or "Captain of the Investigation Team"... Such titles and honors are of no consequence to him when there is so much more research to conduct.
The pursuit of fortune and connections cannot hold a candle to his heart's desire — acquiring the limitless, obscure knowledge left behind by previous generations of scholars.

customize.name: Sucrose
customize.desc: An alchemist filled with curiosity about all things. She researches bio-alchemy.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Sucrose: Direction</color>
Sucrose? I think I more or less understand why she is so dedicated to her research in bio-alchemy... Either way, I'm happy to see her succeed more and more in her endeavors.
<color=#ffd780>About Sucrose: Habits</color>
Working with Sucrose on alchemy research is quite pleasant, but she has some... stubborn qualities in regards to certain aspects unrelated to research. For example, I have told her numerous times to just call me "Albedo" since we are about the same age, but she insists on addressing me in an excessively formal manner. *sigh* ...Whatever she prefers, I guess.
<color=#ffd780>About Albedo: Artistry</color>
As his assistant I learn so much each and every day. What's key is not his existing knowledge, but his talented way of thinking. No matter how complex the task at hand, his way of thinking ensures he gets to the bottom of it, and is able to explain it thoroughly. His methodologies are amazing... to me, it's where alchemy meets art.
<color=#ffd780>About Albedo: Talent</color>
Talent? Let's hypothesize that he and I were to perform the same research — I'd still spend my whole life playing catch up. But, my studying bio-alchemy has nothing to do with evading his line of research, we just happen to have different interests and dreams — nothing more.
<color=#ffd780>About Jean</color>
I don't dare talk to Master Jean that much, because she's so strict. I know she's a good person and all — I know that, I do — but... I still find her scary. I don't tend to bother her, and even when I have to... I ask Albedo to go on my behalf.

customize.name: Lisa
customize.desc: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius, deemed by Sumeru Akademiya to be their most distinguished graduate in the past two centuries.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Lisa</color>
Lisa? I always am impressed by the valuable perspectives she brings to discussions. But is a person with her talents satisfied with such a basic occupation as librarian? There must be some hidden reason for this.
<color=#ffd780>About Albedo</color>
Albedo is quite the alchemist. Just say the word and he'll come up with a good solution. He's easy on the eyes too, just like you.

customize.name: Klee
customize.desc: An explosives expert and a regular at the Knights of Favonius's confinement room. Also known as Fleeing Sunlight.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Klee</color>
Indeed, I view Klee as my younger sister. Whenever she gets herself into some explosive sort of trouble, I can only console myself with the fact that her current destructiveness is nothing compared to that of Miss Alice.
<color=#ffd780>About Albedo</color>
Me and Albedo have a secret code! Whenever he puts a sign on his workshop door saying "Experiment in Progress," that's code for "Come Back Later, Klee." Albedo's really nice and he's so patient with me, so I don't mind waiting until he's finished with his work.
<color=#ffd780>Interesting Things</color>
Every lizard has a different pattern on his back, and some of them you can use their dried-out tails to make gunpowder with. I know because Albedo told me so.

customize.name: Jean
customize.desc: The righteous and rigorous Dandelion Knight, and Acting Grand Master of Mondstadt's Knights of Favonius.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Jean</color>
Jean? She has served exceptionally well as Acting Grand Master. One can even say she is more reliable than Grand Master Varka. Perhaps in our hearts, we all eagerly await the day she can become the official Grand Master herself.
<color=#ffd780>About Albedo</color>
Sometimes I feel that terms like "genius" were originally created for Albedo.
<color=#ffd780>About Sucrose</color>
Sucrose is also a rare talent in the field of alchemy. Under Albedo's mentorship, she is sure to flourish. I am sure her future will be bright. The only thing is... Ahem, I was momentarily lost in thought. It is nothing. Nothing bad, anyway.

customize.name: Xingqiu
customize.desc: A young man carrying a longsword who is frequently seen at book booths. He has a chivalrous heart and yearns for justice and fairness for all.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Xingqiu</color>
Oh, Xingqiu? I find his written works quite interesting. The Yae Publishing House in Inazuma has been asking that I cooperate with a different author for greater royalties. Hmph, do I seem the type to be swayed by a few extra Mora?
<color=#ffd780>About Albedo</color>
I've thought of all the illustrations I want for each major event in the next three volumes! I should write my thoughts down before I forget them, and send them to Mr. Kreideprinz...

customize.name: Barbara
customize.desc: Every citizen of Mondstadt adores Barbara. She learned the word "idol" from a magazine.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Barbara</color>
Barbara? She's a very earnest Deaconess. I once had the opportunity to sketch her a simple portrait... What happened to the sketch? Ah yes... Albert offered to purchase it, but I rejected his bid and gave it to the Acting Grand Master. Social relations... really require a lot of effort.

customize.name: Amber
customize.desc: Always energetic and full of life, Amber's the best — albeit only — Outrider of the Knights of Favonius.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Albedo</color>
Albedo spends most of his time in his workshop, tinkering away with all of his awesome stuff. But, when you see him in person, you never can quite tell what he's thinking... Who knows what goes on in that mind of his...

customize.name: Diona
customize.desc: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Albedo</color>
Alchemy genius? Hmm... I wonder if he knows of a way to finally help me make a drink that people don't like?

customize.name: Kaeya
customize.desc: An accomplished swordsman and a strategic thinker in the Knights of Favonius, rumored to hail from beyond Mondstadt.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>More About Albedo: III</color>
The time required to sketch portraits closely correlates with one's mood. I could spend half a day sketching Huffman, while I might only need three strokes of the pencil to sketch Kaeya — one for the face, one for the eyepatch string... and one for the eyepatch.
<color=#ffd780>About Albedo</color>
Albedo, eh? Calm, collected, and incredibly talented. He's the type everybody likes, some even more so than others. What, you into him as well?

customize.name: Mika
customize.desc: A young knight born to an ordinary family. He serves as a Front-Line Surveyor in his Company. He is a low-key and cautious character.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Albedo</color>
The Chief Alchemist has been very kind to me. He helped me make all the survey equipment I use in the field... I even have some pens he made that will work even when I'm hanging upside down from a tree. But it seems that making artistic sketches is quite different from making maps. I've tried to make some sketches of a target area as supplemental intel before, and word has it that Captain Albedo went silent for a long time when he saw them...

customize.name: Mona
customize.desc: A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title. Erudite, but prideful.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Albedo</color>
Albedo? Ah... I envy his ability to solely focus on his research without getting bogged down in mundane worldly affairs. What a wonderful life! If that batty old lady hadn't had one too many screws loose, perhaps that's the life I'd be living by now myself...
<color=#ffd780>About Klee</color>
Ah yes, Alice's daughter. She's in the custody of the Knights of Favonius, and Albedo looks after her too. She's blessed to have Trifolium as her constellation, which represents good luck. I'm slightly envious... *smirk* Although, if I'd been blessed with good luck, I suppose I never would have had the great honor of running into that old woman, would I...

customize.name: Rosaria
customize.desc: A sister of the church, though you wouldn't know it if it weren't for her attire. Known for her sharp, cold words and manner, she often works alone.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Albedo</color>
He's like an oil painting you find hanging on the wall in some ancient hall, profound and mysterious... hard to see through. But what can I say, I find people with stories... interesting.

customize.name: Venti
customize.desc: One of the many bards of Mondstadt, who freely wanders the city's streets and alleys.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Albedo</color>
How do you explain white chalk in black soil, or the earth's dense crust amidst the emptiness of space? Same reason the purest soil gave birth to human life... It's an ancient power with unmistakable properties. Trying to harness it is dangerous indeed, I can't imagine what would happen if someone lost control of it in the city... Ah, never mind! What goes on within Mondstadt's walls is up to Mondstadt's people to deal with!

customize.name: Harbinger of Dawn
customize.desc: A sword that once shone like the sun. The wielder of this sword will be blessed with a "feel-good" buff. The reflective material on the blade has long worn off.

customize.text:
Harbinger of Dawn(3-star)
Characteristics:
<color=#ffd780>ATK</color> <color=#ffd780>Bonus</color> from stat, <color=#ffd780>CRIT DMG</color> from secondary stat and <color=#ffd780>CRIT Rate</color> from Passive
Low cost to obtain
Good transitional weapon for newbie
How to obtain:
Secret Pirate Treasure: Pavo Ocellus Chapter
Talk to Nanako in Inazuma City, Narukami Island, Inazuma
<color=#ffffff73>Talk to Eymen, the bartender in Port Ormos, after completing the main quests in Sumeru</color>

customize.name: Cinnabar Spindle
customize.desc: A sword made from materials that do not belong in this world. The power within might even be able to withstand the corruption of a venom that could corrode a mighty dragon.

customize.text:
Cinnabar Spindle (4-star)
Characteristics:
<color=#ffd780>ATK</color> <color=#ffd780>Bonus</color> from stat, <color=#ffd780>DEF Bonus</color> from secondary stat and Elemental Skill <color=#ffd780>DMG Bonus</color> based on <color=#ffd780>DEF</color> from Passive
Good match for Albedo’s Elemental Skill whose <color=#b28659>Geo DMG</color> from Transient Blossoms upon enemies within the Solar Isotoma field will be subject to <color=#ffd780>DEF</color>
Low cost to obtain and enhance
Not bad 4-star weapon for Albedo
How to obtain:
Limited weapon from Shadows Amidst Snowstorms

customize.name: Primordial Jade Cutter
customize.desc: A ceremonial sword masterfully carved from pure jade. There almost seems to be an audible sigh in the wind as it is swung.

customize.text:
Primordial Jade Cutter (5-star)
Characteristics:
<color=#ffd780>High ATK</color> <color=#ffd780>Bonus</color> from stat, <color=#ffd780>CRIT Rate</color> Bonus from secondary stat and <color=#ffd780>HP</color> and <color=#ffd780>ATK Bonus</color> based on <color=#ffd780>HP</color> limit from Passive
High overall attributes
High cost to obtain
How to obtain:
Limited-time Event Wish

customize.name: Freedom-Sworn
customize.desc: A straight sword, azure as antediluvian song, and as keen as the oaths of freedom taken in the Land of Wind.

customize.text:

<color=#ffd780>ATK</color> <color=#ffd780>Bonus</color> from stat, <color=#ffd780>Elemental Mastery</color> Bonus from secondary stat and <color=#ffd780>ATK Bonus</color> from Passive
<color=#ffffff73>Equipped with this set, the character can also trigger the effect even when control-less</color>
